parts.text:
DeepSpeed
```json
{
  "software": [
    "DeepSpeed",
    "Megatron-LM",
    "PyTorch",
    "Slurm"
  ],
  "resources": {
    "nodes": 16,
    "gpus_per_node": 4,
    "cores_per_task": 40,
    "memory": "Not specified, but likely significant",
    "storage": {
      "scratch": [
        "$SCRATCH/Megatron-DeepSpeed",
        "$six_ALL_CCFRSCRATCH/synched_exps/tr3m-1B3-pile/"
      ],
      "work": [
        "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/datasets/pile/pile_text_document",
        "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/start-prod",
        "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/models",
        "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/datasets",
        "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/modules",
        "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/metrics"
      ]
    },
    "time_limit": "20:00:00"
  },
  "model": {
    "type": "GPT",
    "parameters": {
      "num_layers": 24,
      "hidden_size": 2048,
      "num_attention_heads": 16,
      "ffn_hidden_size": 8192,
      "seq_length": 2048,
      "vocab_size": "Not specified, but likely inferred from gpt2-vocab.json"
    },
    "training": {
      "batch_size": 512,
      "micro_batch_size": 8,
      "optimizer": "adam",
      "learning_rate": 2e-4,
      "fp16": true,
      "loss_scale": 12
    }
  }
}
```
